reviewText: Well, here I go--spoiling my great-grandson Devon again!Ever since I first saw Devon sitting on the floor of his home watching cartoons--all wide-eyed with "little boy wonderment"--I've been buying him a variety of cartoons. FromToy Story 3to Disney versions of such classics asPinocchio (Walt Disney's Masterpiece), Devon has a good collection.It was a natural selection at Christmas to buy him this collection of classic Christmas cartoons.TV Christmas Cartoonscontains eleven of my favorites; I won't name them all since Amazon lists them in the product description. Instead I'll list Devon's favorites, the ones his mother tells me he watches repeatedly:1. Jack Frost2. The Star of Bethlehem3. The Shanty Where Santy Claus LivesIt does my heart good when his mother paints a vivid picture of him sitting there, giggling and giggling. Is there a more pleasant sound in the world than  a child's laughter? A babbling brook comes close...I know how obsessed adults can be about high-definition resolution and perfection of film, but that doesn't matter to kids, so it doesn't matter to me in this case. What makes Devon happy, makes Grammy happy. Is it any wonder I spoil him?Highly recommended... And I'm laughing all the way to the bank because the price is so reasonable, making it easier to buy him more.Reviewed by Betty Dravis, January 10, 2011Author of "The Toonies Invade Silicon Valley"
summary: Classic Christmas Cartoons that will entrance your kids...
Title: TV Christmas Cartoons

reviewText: Great collection of cartoons from childhood! Forgot how sad some of these are! I Wish the quality was better though.

reviewText: great compilation of Christmas classics.  Loved the oldies but goodies and having a great time exposing my little one to what cartoons were once like.

reviewText: My brother would laugh until his laughter became a barely audible squeeking.  It was usually a "roadie cyote" but any cartoon where the villan is outsmated was hillarity.  This has become a favorite gift:  cartoons from Lin.
Title: TV Christmas Cartoons

reviewText: Great old Xmas cartoons I enjoyed when I was a kid and now my kids are enjoying the same images of Xmas Cartoons from my childhood.
